title: Canadian Energy Companies Are Outperforming Despite Weak Oil Prices

title: OPEC+ Holds Output Steady, Approves New Capacity Framework Through 2026

title: What’s Next for OPEC+ in the Glut Year?
summary: OPEC+ is meeting this coming weekend to discuss the next steps in its production control plan. Early reports suggest the group will stick to a pause in the rollback of its cuts.
